subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Brandon Weeden completed 47 of 60 passes for 438 yards, sparking a wild turnaround in the second half as Oklahoma State beat Texas A&M in the Big 12 opener for both teams.
snippet: Quarterback Brandon Weeden completed 47 of 60 passes for 438 yards, sparking a wild turnaround in the second half as Oklahoma State beat Texas A&M in the Big 12 opener for both teams.
